name: The Adventures Of Lee
description:
Created by Corbin Nolley

Modifications include 3 new, unique, and challenging levels. Along with a new Main Menu page, and scores that are bigger and works more, and a more powerful enemy. 

I am unsure why it won't open a new browser to play the game, it worked fine on my Unity when I would open it, check the screenshot. Thanks and apologies for the mistake.
